content.body: is it "allowed" for an implementation to set the value of [[ImportMeta]] to some arbitrary value before the logic of loading import.meta runs, effectively short circuiting it?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: is it "allowed" for an implementation to set the value of [[ImportMeta]] to some arbitrary value before the logic of loading import.meta runs, effectively short circuiting it?

content.body: i should say this question isn't so much about import.meta specifically as it is about the "short circuiting" of intended semantics
